metadata.name: The Leftovers
metadata.description:
Leftover experimentation: contemplation over an empty plate with Ableton Live, Playtron by Playtronica, Poetry and Music.

“These are the leftovers⁠
بچا ہوا
bouncing off the walls⁠
Scraps of carbs now eaten up⁠
⁠War on Gluten⁠
War on Gluten⁠
food’s complicated⁠
a deeply corrupted complicated relationship ⁠
only the stems of broccoli remain⁠
⁠maybe alongside an old lemon⁠
Marjoram will never be the same⁠
⁠Are you going to Scarborough fair? - Brussel sprouts, rosemary, half a scallion and thyme?⁠
⁠Remember me to one who lives there⁠
for we refuse to let it all be in vain”

Created by XRE Members
She's Excited! (Music, Production, Visuals) @shes_excited
Clara Francesca (Voice, Poetry, Subject) @clar_esca
